Name: Caché
Language(s): Caché ObjectScript (dynamic language), Basic. Java/.NET object mapping supported.
SQL support: SQL subset. Object notation allowed. Supports embedded SQL, dynamic SQL and xDBC access.
Description: MUMPS ancestry. Includes built-in support for XML, Web/AJAX and an EMB system called Ensemble. Supports embedded, client/server and distributed implementations.

Name: ConceptBase
Description: historical db, active rules, meta-modeling, deductive rules

Name: Db4o
Description: Native Queries, LINQ support, automatic schema evolution, Transparent Activation/Persistence, replication to RDBMS, Object Manager plugin for Visual Studio and Eclipse

Name: GemStone/S
Description: Persistent, transactional, multi-user Smalltalk developed by GemTalk Systems.

Name: Objectivity/DB
Language(s): C++, C#, Java, Python, Smalltalk and XML

Name: ObjectStore
SQL support: SQL subset (also has own object query language)
Description: Embedded database supporting efficient, distributed management of C++ and Java objects.  Avoids the complexities and limitations of ORM products such as Hibernate by storing objects directly with their relationships intact.  Uses a page-based mapping system for fast locking and efficient, distributed, client-side caching.

Name: ODABA
Datatypes: Basic Types, Classes, Multiple inheritance, Weak Typed

Name: OpenLink Virtuoso
Language(s): C++, Java/JSP, ASP, ASPX, Mono, RDF, SPARQL, SPARUL, SQL, Perl, Python, PHP, Ruby, XML, ODBC, JDBC, ADO.NET, more

Name: Perst
Language(s): Java (including Java SE, Java ME & Android), C# (including .NET, .NET Compact Framework, Mono & Silverlight)
Description: Small footprint embedded database. Diverse indexes and specialized collection class; LINQ; replication; ACID transactions; native full text search; includes Silverlight, Android and Java ME demo apps.

Name: siaqodb
Language(s): C#, .NET, Mono, WinRT, Silverlight,  Windows Phone, Android, iOS, Unity3D, .NET Compact Framework
Description: NoSQL embedded database for .NET that runs on .NET, Mono, WinRT, iOS, Android, WindowsPhone, Unity3D,Compact Framework

Name: Twig
Description: Built on Google App Engine's low-level Datastore API

Name: WakandaDB
SQL support: No support. Use REST & SSJS instead
Description: NoSQL REST / Server-Side JavaScript engine. Integrates Webkit JavaScriptCore engine with HTML5 JS APIs supported on the server. Tables and columns are replaced by JavaScript DataClasses and attributes.

Name: Zope Object Database
SQL support: No support. Object indexing and searching is done through ZCatalog facility.
